definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Seismic velocity can occasionally be affected by porosity and temperature.
sentences.chinese: 孔隙率和温度有时也能影响地震波速。

sentences.english: Micro-cracks of rocks is closely related to in situ velocity variation.
sentences.chinese: 岩石微裂隙与主孔原位波速变化有密切关系。

sentences.english: Porosity and clay content in sandstone are two important factors affecting wave velocity.
sentences.chinese: 砂岩孔隙度和含泥量是影响波速的两个重要因素。

sentences.english: The confidence is at least 95% on calculating velocity ratio when considering station factor.
sentences.chinese: 考虑台站因素，计算波速比的置信度最低达到95%。

sentences.english: For beam specimens, there is no obvious relation between P-wave or R-wave speed to the compressive strength.
sentences.chinese: 在梁试体方面P波及R波波速与强度间也无明显关系。

sentences.english: Soil shear wave velocity is an important parameter which influence the dynamic properties of soil, and it is widely used in engineering practices.
sentences.chinese: 土层的剪切波速是反映土体动力特性的重要参数。

sentences.english: Shear wave velocity is an important indicator which influence the ability that mediators propagate waves.
sentences.chinese: 剪切波速是反映介质对波传播能力的一个重要指标。

definition: simple harmonic (motion, oscillation etc in mechanics)
